DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "COMMANDER4J_DEV"."VIEW_JOURNEYS" ("JOURNEY_REF", "TIMESLOT", "LOAD_TYPE", "LOAD_TYPE_DESC", "DESCRIPTION") AS SELECT JOURNEY_REF,TIMESLOT,LOAD_TYPE,LOAD_TYPE_DESC, (TO_CHAR(TIMESLOT,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') || ' ' || RPAD(LOAD_TYPE,10,' ') || ' ' || RPAD(LOAD_TYPE_DESC,20,' ') || RPAD(HAULIER,20,' ') ) AS DESCRIPTION FROM APP_JOURNEY WHERE STATUS = 'Unassigned';
